scripts.lint: tslint --project tsconfig.json && tslint --project tsconfig.test.json && tslint --project tsconfig.unittest.json
scripts.fix: tslint --project tsconfig.json --fix && tslint --project tsconfig.test.json --fix && tslint --project tsconfig.unittest.json --fix
scripts.test: yarn run rm && yarn run lint && yarn run build && ttsc --project tsconfig.test.json && tsc --project tsconfig.unittest.json && jest
scripts.rm: rimraf build-lib && rimraf build-test && rimraf build-unittest
